## Your Gradual Stupidity Reduction Program

On Wishonia, we stopped having wars all at once, but we're more advanced. You're like toddlers who can split atoms. You can't just stop being stupid immediately - that would be like teaching a dog calculus before it learns to sit.

So this book teaches you to be less stupid gradually:

It's like weaning a baby off eating paint chips. You can't just take away all the paint chips at once. They'll cry. You have to gradually replace paint chips with food until they forget paint chips were ever an option.
